Manjot Nagyal

About Me

Data is everywhere—even in the smallest microbial communities. I harness it to develop computational solutions for challenges in human and environmental health.

Hi, I’m Manjot! I'm a bioinformatics researcher and computational biologist passionate about transforming biological data into meaningful discoveries. From securing NSF grants for high-performance computing research to training machine learning models for bacterial promoter predictions, I love tackling complex problems.

I spend my free time drawing, mentoring, and experimenting with new coding projects. If you're into data, bioinformatics, or just cool science conversations, let’s connect!
